name: Shimmering Spark
passive: Energized: Moving and attacking builds Energy. At 100 stacks, your next attack deals bonus magic damage and grants Movement Speed.
description: Item that provides Ability Power, Attack Speed, Movement Speed. Passive effect: Moving and attacking builds Energy. At 100 stacks, your next attack deals bonus magic damage and grants Movement Speed.. A versatile item that can benefit many champion types.
tips: The movement speed helps with roaming and map presence
Great for champions who need to reposition frequently in fights
Helps with both engaging and disengaging from unfavorable situations
Excellent for champions who rely on basic attacks
Helps with last hitting and taking objectives faster
